text: [Music]
hi folks and welcome to in the kitchen
with Pete today's simple and delicious
recipe is ceviche ceviche has been
around for hundreds of years
typically back in the 1700s in Peru they
would use raw seafood and use citrus -
not quite cook it but it firms up the

I found that several of my guests and my
wife Kelly she enjoys her seafood cooked
so I'm pre cooking my shrimp today and
we're gonna make a lovely ceviche and

this together I've got all my

with 2 cups of shrimp i precooked this I
let the water come to a boil put the
shrimp in when it comes to a boil again
cook it for 3 minutes remove it and then
put it in a cool bath of water and ice
cubes to chill it down and I dice them
up Oh 1/2 inch pieces so let's get that
in our Bowl next we're gonna have a
quarter cup of finely diced red onion
next we have a half a cup of finely
diced cucumber
and we're going to put in a cup of
finely diced tomatoes I'm going to put
one diced avocado and one finely diced
jalapeno go nice little bit of heat
flavor I've got two celery stalks just
small celery stalks finely diced give it

about a half a cup of finely chopped

maybe put some parsley in that's my
model if you don't like an ingredient
take it out you make it your own
that's what cooking's all about then the

one whole lemon a little bit of salt
pepper
now I like to add some hot sauce to this
again to your preference to your taste
put in a little bit of hot sauce you put

here's the special ingredient that I
like Clamato juice I'm gonna put this is

we'll get this mixed up I like to chill

it's gonna be so good so here it is all

I've just got some little tostito scoops
over here in these three and then I came
